name: 0°N 0°W

files.file: N/A:Select the zip file downloaded from itch.io (0n0w-win.zip)

content:
files:
- file: N/A:Select the zip file downloaded from itch.io (0n0w-win.zip)
- filename: 0n0w-win.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/0n0w/0n0w.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2015 win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/0n0w
    file: 0n0w-win.zip
wine:
  dxvk: true
